title: cc菜单
author: UnCreateds
txt_content: 请问cc菜单怎么显示自定义头颅，玩家的头颅？

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
UnCreateds 发表于 2020-3-21 17:29
#------------------- Chest Commands Errors -------------------#
1) The icon "headtest" in the menu ...
  ID: PLAYER_HEAD

改成
ID: 397
DATA-VALUE: 3

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
SKULL-OWNER
当"ID"节点为头颅(skull:3/player_skull)时,指定头颅的主人(必须是正版玩家的ID)

https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-833109-1-1.html

  ID: PLAYER_HEAD
  SKULL-OWNER: "Zapic"

replies.author: UnCreateds
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-3-20 15:17
SKULL-OWNER
当"ID"节点为头颅(skull:3/player_skull)时,指定头颅的主人(必须是正版玩家的ID)
没看懂呀

replies.author: UnCreateds
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-3-20 15:17
SKULL-OWNER
当"ID"节点为头颅(skull:3/player_skull)时,指定头颅的主人(必须是正版玩家的ID)
请问在菜单里怎么配置？

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
UnCreateds 发表于 2020-3-20 15:21
没看懂呀
headtest:
  ID: PLAYER_HEAD
  SKULL-OWNER: "正版id"
  POSITION-X: 1
  POSITION-Y: 1

replies.author: UnCreateds
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-3-20 15:22
headtest:
  ID: PLAYER_HEAD
  SKULL-OWNER: "正版id"
如果是头颅插件的头颅呢？

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
UnCreateds 发表于 2020-3-20 15:37
如果是头颅插件的头颅呢？
用不了，必须知道正版 id

replies.author: Arasple
replies.txt_content:
UnCreateds 发表于 2020-3-20 15:37
如果是头颅插件的头颅呢？
可以用 TrMenu，支持 HeadDatabase 头颅一键引用或者是自定义纹理的头颅

ID: PLAYER_HEAD（意思是玩家头颅）
  SKULL-OWNER: "正版玩家名字"
  POSITION-X: 1（横向方位）
  POSITION-Y: 1（竖条方位）

replies.author: UnCreateds
replies.txt_content:
